plot: McNulty goes on a drunken binge of legendary proportions. Fellow stevedores convince Ziggy to fight Maui. Bunk, seeing McNulty's desperation, talks Daniels into asking for him. Daniels does so and Rawls, who has no choice, agrees. After some labor, the wiretap is up, just in time to catch another disappearing container.—Anonymous

McNulty deals with the disappointment of his failed reconciliation with his wife Elena (Callie Thorne) by returning to his old drinking and womanising ways. The detail fill Pearlman in on their case; with evidence that Nick is dealing drugs, and that the Greek's driver, Sergei Malatov (Chris Ashworth), is in touch with Prop Joe, they are able to get a wire approved on Malatov's phone and the Greeks' warehouse. Bunk is officially detailed and attempts to convince Daniels to push for McNulty's involvement in the case. Ziggy becomes increasingly frustrated with Nick's refusal to let him get involved in drug dealing, unhappy with being paid for doing nothing. When Sobotka decides to pay his bills, he is confused to discover his phone account has been flagged so as to not have service disconnected. With business faltering in the towers, Bodie is forced to consider moving his crew to new territory.—Bertaut
